availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Executive Journal, 1859-1862

body.p:
2
The Governor approved the following accounts, to wit:

row.cell: Lou & Frkft R. R freight on 1 Cannon
Steamer Doves' freight on arms shiped to St Louis
John Haly repairs at Auditors office
Steamer Doves freight bill on Arms

body.p: He commissioned the following Majors for Clinton County Wm C. Wood and Wm Morrison
Also Jas A. Hawkins, Paymaster, Geo. N Mathews Quarter Master, Geo. W. Goodman, Surgeon of Anderson County
He issued a Requisition on the Governor of Indiana for Isaac Rosenbaum, under an indictment in the Jefferson Circuit Court for Felony and appointed Robt A. Seay, Agent.
He approved the Constitution and By-laws of the Bozzan's Grays a Military Company of Germantown under modifcations made by Inspector General.
